name: Back2Basik
description:
You control a controller who controls a controllable character, guiding him to the exit, but we ran out of the regular control mechanics so you're gonna have to use 'control' blocks to move them.

Deposit control blocks into command executer to control character. Avoid the blocker enemy who will kill you, but also block your commands, so use timing strategically.

WASD/Arrow keys to move player.

R to restart level

All levels have been play tested and are do-able. If you glitch through the walls, it's a feature, not a bug I promise :)

How many moves did it take you to complete the game? Comment below.
